import React from'react';import{motion}from"framer-motion";var blackBox={initial:{height:'100vh',bottom:0},animate:{height:0,transition:{duration:1.5,ease:[0.87,0,0.13,1]}}};var InitialTransition=function InitialTransition(){return React.createElement(motion.div,{//   className="absolute z-50 flex items-center justify-center w-full bg-black"
initial:"initial",animate:"animate",variants:blackBox,onAnimationStart:function onAnimationStart(){return document.body.classList.add("overflow-hidden");},onAnimationComplete:function onAnimationComplete(){return document.body.classList.remove("overflow-hidden");}});};export default InitialTransition;
